slugify-string.cardDescription: Convert strings to URL-friendly slugs. Perfect for filenames, URLs, and identifiers.
slugify-string.inputPlaceholder: Put your string here (ex: My file path)
slugify-string.outputPlaceholder: Your slug will be generated here (ex: my-file-path)
slugify-string.cardInputDescription: Paste text to generate a URL-friendly slug. Great for URLs, filenames, and identifiers.
slugify-string.cardOutputDescription: Copy the generated slug and use it in your URLs, filenames, or IDs.
